name: Meka Prawn
description:
Put your dukes up!

Give the skies the ol' one-two in this genre-bending blend of the fighting game ARMS and Cute-em-up SHMUPs like Cotton or Fantasy Zone!

CONTROLS:

Movement - WASD

Attacks: 

Fist 1: Shift or Left Click

Fist 2: Space or Right Click

You've got two hands! Press an attack to throw a punch, but mind that you can't throw another until your fist comes back! Hold a button to throw a circular Haymaker Shot!

Made for Harry Alisavakis' "Technically a Game Jam" for the "Technically Speaking" Tech Art Discord. Theme: "Like X, but Y".
